biotools.summary:
An Open Source Data Integration Tool for Big Data Transcriptomics Designed for the Malaria Vector Anopheles gambiae.

IR-TEx allows selection of datasets dependent on the user’s criteria.

Download the .zip file containing the following: IR-TEx.

Download the latest version of R software, available at https://cran.r-project.org/mirrors.html.

bioschemas.name: IR-TEx
